remarks.format: ## Remarks 當啟用排序藉由設定屬性控制權傳輸至`true`，控制項呈現每個資料行的標頭中。When sorting is enabled by setting the property of the control to `true`, controls are rendered in the header of each column. 這些連結可讓您排序控制項的選取資料行。These links allow you to sort the control by the selected column. 就會引發事件時按一下控制項時。The event is raised when a control is clicked. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件排序控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to sort a control.
